info.title: WinRate AI API
info.description: API de predictions de paris sportifs sur le football europeen

get.description: Basic health check.

Readiness check including dependencies.

Returns "ready" if all critical services are up, "degraded" if
non-critical services (like Redis) are unavailable.

schema.title: Response Readiness Check Health Ready Get

get.description:
Get list of matches with optional filters from database.

Competition codes:
- PL: Premier League
- PD: La Liga
- BL1: Bundesliga
- SA: Serie A
- FL1: Ligue 1
- CL: Champions League
- EL: Europa League

get.description: Get upcoming matches for the next N days from database.

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

get.description:
Get live match scores with real-time updates.

Returns all currently playing matches with scores, minute, and status.
Results are cached for 30 seconds to reduce API calls.

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

get.description:
Get list of all supported competitions.

Returns competition codes, names, countries, and flag codes for UI display.
This is the single source of truth for competition data.

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

get.description: Get details for a specific match from database (requires authentication).

get.description:
Get current league standings for a competition.

Standings are pre-calculated daily at 6am and cached.

Competition codes:
- PL: Premier League
- PD: La Liga
- BL1: Bundesliga
- SA: Serie A
- FL1: Ligue 1

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

get.description:
Get the 5 best picks for the specified date ONLY.

Selection criteria:
- Minimum 5% value vs bookmaker odds
- Minimum 60% confidence
- Diversified across competitions

Uses database caching to persist predictions across server restarts.

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

get.description: Debug endpoint to check prediction data state.

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

get.description:
Get historical prediction performance statistics.

Stats are pre-calculated daily at 6am and cached.
Use force_refresh=true to bypass cache.

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

get.description:
Get daily breakdown of prediction statistics.

Returns stats grouped by day for charting accuracy over time.
Each day includes: date, predictions count, correct count, accuracy.

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

get.description:
Get calibration analysis for prediction accuracy.

Compares predicted confidence levels with actual outcomes to assess
how well-calibrated the predictions are. A well-calibrated model
should have 70% accuracy when it predicts 70% confidence.

Returns:
    - Overall accuracy and calibration error
    - Breakdown by bet type (home_win, draw, away_win)
    - Breakdown by confidence buckets (50-60%, 60-70%, etc.)
    - Performance by competition

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

get.description:
Get detailed prediction for a specific match.

Cache strategy: Redis (30min) -> DB (permanent) -> Generate -> Save both

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

post.description:
Verify a prediction against actual match result.

Updates the prediction record with actual scores and correctness.
Used for tracking prediction accuracy and ROI.

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

post.description: Force refresh a prediction (admin only).

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

get.description:
Get current ML system status.

Checks HuggingFace ML service (remote) instead of local models
to avoid OOM on 512MB Render.

post.description:
Start data collection in background.

Collects historical match data from football-data.org API.
This is a long-running task that runs in the background.

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

post.description:
Deprecated: Use /train-remote instead.

Local training is disabled to avoid OOM on 512MB Render.
Models are trained on HuggingFace Spaces (16GB RAM).

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

post.description:
Deprecated: Use /train-remote instead.

Local ML pipeline is disabled to avoid OOM on 512MB Render.
Models are trained on HuggingFace Spaces (16GB RAM).

get.description:
Get current pipeline execution status.

Returns whether a pipeline task is running and the result of the last run.

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

get.description:
Get finished matches for ML training (API key protected).

This endpoint is called by HuggingFace Spaces to fetch training data.
Requires X-API-Key header matching HF_TRAINING_API_KEY env var.

Returns matches with:
- Team stats (attack, defense, ELO)
- Form and fatigue metrics
- Result (0=home_win, 1=draw, 2=away_win)

post.description:
Trigger model training on HuggingFace Spaces.

This endpoint:
1. Fetches training data from database (finished matches with stats)
2. Sends data to HuggingFace /train endpoint
3. Returns training results (accuracy, feature importance)

Requires admin authentication.

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

post.description:
Trigger weekly data synchronization.

This should be called every Sunday evening (e.g., via cron job).
Syncs matches for the next 7 days and all standings.

Cron example: 0 20 * * 0 curl -X POST https://api/sync/weekly

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

post.description: Sync only matches (no standings).

Use this to populate historical data for ML training.

- Range validation: Values within expected bounds
- Consistency: Duplicates and conflicts

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

post.description:
Sync historical match data for multiple past seasons.

Fetches FINISHED matches for each past season from football-data.org
to build a larger training dataset for ML models.

The football-data.org API `season` parameter takes the start year
(e.g. 2023 for the 2023-2024 season).

WARNING: This is a long-running operation due to API rate limits
(10 req/min). Each season requires one API call per competition.
Expect ~7 seconds between calls.

Args:
    seasons: Number of past seasons to fetch (default: 3, max: 5)

parameters.name: seasons

schema.description: Number of past seasons to fetch (1-5)
schema.title: Seasons

parameters.description: Number of past seasons to fetch (1-5)

Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

get.description:
Calculate Kelly Criterion stake suggestion.

Kelly formula: f* = (bp - q) / b
Where:
- f* = fraction of bankroll to bet
- b = decimal odds - 1
- p = probability of winning
- q = probability of losing (1 - p)

401.description: Authentification requise - Token manquant ou invalide

post.description:
Create a Stripe Checkout session for subscription purchase.

Requires authentication. Creates a checkout session for the specified plan
with a 7-day free trial.

Create a Stripe Customer Portal session for subscription management.

Allows users to manage their subscription, update payment methods,
view invoices, and cancel.

get.description:
Get the current user's subscription details.

Returns None if no active subscription exists.

schema.title: Response Get Subscription Api V1 Stripe Subscription Get

post.description:
Cancel the current user's subscription.

By default, cancels at the end of the billing period.
Set immediate=True to cancel immediately.

schema.title: Response Cancel Subscription Api V1 Stripe Cancel Subscription Post

post.description:
Handle Stripe webhook events.

Events handled:
- checkout.session.completed: User completed checkout
- customer.subscription.created: Subscription started
- customer.subscription.updated: Subscription changed
- customer.subscription.deleted: Subscription cancelled
- invoice.paid: Payment successful
- invoice.payment_failed: Payment failed

schema.title: Response Stripe Webhook Api V1 Stripe Webhook Post
